Samir Yousef Ghanem (Arabic; 15 Jenụwarị 1937 - 20 Mee 2021) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe ọchị, na-agụ egwu, na onye na-eme ntụrụndụ.
A mụrụ Ghanem na al-ʿAtawlah, Asyut Governorate. O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Agriculture na Mahadum Alexandria
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị na-eme ihe ọchị atọ Tholathy Adwa'a El Masrah n'akụkụ George Sidhom na El Deif Ahmed. Mbido mbụ ha bụ Doctor Save Me, arụmọrụ dị mkpirikpi nke mere ka ha banye n'ụwa ntụrụndụ
Ha gosipụtara ihe ngosi TV mbụ Ramadan Riddles

Mgbe El Deif Ahmed nwụsịrị n'afọ 1970, Ghanem na Sidhom gara n'ihu n'okpuru otu aha (Tholathy Adwa'a El Masrah) ruo n'afọ 1980. Ha abụọ rụzuru ihe nkiri, na-arụkọ ọrụ na Salah Zulfikar na Fondo 'El Talat Wara'at n'afọ 1974 & Al-Mutazawwigun n'afọ 1978 na ndị ọzọ.
Samir Ghanem kwadoro ihe ngosi na OTV nke akpọrọ An Hour With Samir Gjanem
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Dalal Abdel Aziz, ma bụrụ
a nna nke ndị na-eme egwuregwu Donia na Amy.

Ghanem, onye na-agbake n'ụlọ ọgwụ site na ọnọdụ siri ike mgbe ọ butere COVID-19, nwụrụ site na nsogbu nke ọrụ akụrụ na mucormycosis metụtara ọrịa ahụ na El Safa Hospital na Mohandiseen, Giza n'abalị 20 ọnwa Mee afọ 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ 84.
Nwunye ya, Dalal Abdel Aziz, nwụrụ na 7 Ọgọst 2021, n'ihi nsogbu COVID-19.
Ghanem sonyere n'ihe karịrị ọrụ 300 gụnyere ihe nkiri, usoro TV na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri, nke ikpeazụ n'ime ha bụ na usoro Badal Al Hadduta Talata na nwa ya nwanyị Donia Samir Ghanem.
Mgbe George Sidhom lara ezumike nká n'ihi ọrịa mkpọnwụ ahụ, Samir Ghanem gara n'ihu na-emepụta ihe nkiri.
